com.flyingspaniel.nava.emit

Class Emit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flyingspaniel.nava.emit.Emit

  • public class Emit
extends java.lang.Object
    Interfaces and utilities for node.js style event handling stuff, a simplified, more generic event handling The "events" are passed as an arg0, followed by a possibly empty varags Object... Warning: The generics are mainly for documentation and decoration. Internally there are unchecked casts and if you screw up you will get ClassCastExceptions
    Since:
    Copyright(c) 2013 Morgan Conrad
    Author:
    Morgan Conrad
    See Also:
    This software is released under the LGPL

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Emit.IEmitter
      Interface for objects that can emit/broadcast "events" of various eventIDs
      static interface  Emit.IListener<A0>
      Client Interface to listen to "events".
      static interface  Emit.IListenerList<A0>
      Interface for emitting only a single eventID of event.
